sourcesContent:
import { TableContainer, Paper, Table, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import { Basket } from "../../App/Models/Basket"; export default function BasketSummary(basket:Basket|null) { const subtotal = 0; const deliveryFee = 0; return ( <> Subtotal {subtotal} Delivery fee* {deliveryFee} Total {subtotal + deliveryFee} *Orders over $100 qualify for free delivery
) }
